ESSE JOGO É SIMPLESMENTE PATÉTICO, ANOS E ANOS DE CS:GO E MESMO ASSIM REPLETO DE BUGS, REPLETO DE PLAYERS TÓXICOS, E COM MAIS HACKER DO QUE NUNCA. VÁRIOS JOGOS LAGADO DEVIDO A QUALIDADE DE MERDA DO SERVIDOR SEM FALAR NA QUANTIDADE RIDÍCULA DE GRINGOS. SE A VALVE FALIR EU NÃO ME IMPRESSIONO NADA. PARABÉNS A VC QUE INSISTE EM JOGAR ESSE JOGO E BOA SORTE.

Pretty good old school game. Perfect for improving your aim and game sense. Altough recent updates have caused the game to have a bit of pay-to-win in it. Some character skins in the game might provide more camoflouge than others, granting you a huge advantage in some maps where you can blend in with walls and bushes. Even in 2020 this game is definitely playable and enjoyable, even after 8 years of being out. I recommnd buying the whole game, you'll encounter a lot of cheaters if not.
